attributes.action: Stop childrens fingerprints and/or photographs (of school age) being taken without perental consent.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Education authorities are secretly taking fingerprints and photographs from school children as young as 5 years old,while they are attending school or attending school activities,without perental consent.
this is an infringment of human and civil rights.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
